summary: This bill, the "Restoring the Sanctity of Public Entombments, Cemeteries, and Tributes Act of 2025" or "RESPECT Act of 2025," addresses the authority to reconsider decisions regarding the interment or honoring of individuals in national cemeteries. It amends Title 38 of the United States Code, specifying that reconsiderations apply to decisions made after June 18, 1973, and updates references to the Sex Offender Registration and Notification Act. Additionally, it repeals a subsection of a previous law relating to national cemeteries.
